summary: A Fine Retexture in Ultra HD for all Carts
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WKFXgj9l.jpg[/IMG]

Have you always missed a better looking Handcart in High Resolution ? Well not anymore ! Here comes another Fine Ultra HD Release in 2 Versions and 3 different Resolutions !



Version 1 Brighter and Clean Wood Version available in 1k, 2k, 4k

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o7X0Slsl.jpg[/IMG]



Version 2 Darker Rough Wood Dirty version available in 1k, 2k, 4k

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Morh55l.jpg[/IMG]

[youtube]1rLfWT01_nQ[/youtube]


Installation:
1.Unpack the Archive
2.Open the Resolution Folder that you want 1k or 2k or 4k
3.Drop the Data Folder inside the Resolution Folder that you have choosen into your Skyrim Main Directory

Please Endorse this Mod if you like it !

Enjoy your New Carts !

A Good Combination for this Mod would be This Fine Texture Pack

[youtube]7OQB7bk7HkI[/youtube]


Credits to Nexus and Bethesda !

Thanks to rockinbandit for some nice User Screenshots !

HXP[/center]
author: HXP
